content.text: Match ends, Chelsea 3, Manchester City 4.
Second Half ends, Chelsea 3, Manchester City 4.
Attempt blocked. Oscar (Chelsea) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Ramires.
Goal!  Chelsea 3, Manchester City 4. Micah Richards (Manchester City) right footed shot from very close range to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Javi García with a headed pass.
Gaël Clichy (Manchester City) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Fernando Torres (Chelsea).
Corner,  Manchester City. Conceded by Paulo Ferreira.
Corner,  Manchester City. Conceded by Ashley Cole.
Foul by Nathan Aké (Chelsea).
Carlos Tévez (Manchester City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Goal!  Chelsea 3, Manchester City 3. Edin Dzeko (Manchester City) right footed shot from the right side of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Carlos Tévez.
Corner,  Manchester City. Conceded by Andreas Christensen.
Attempt blocked. Carlos Tévez (Manchester City) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Gaël Clichy.
Corner,  Chelsea. Conceded by Micah Richards.
Foul by David Luiz (Chelsea).
Edin Dzeko (Manchester City) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

Foul by David Luiz (Chelsea).
Edin Dzeko (Manchester City) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Attempt missed. Carlos Tévez (Manchester City) right footed shot from the centre of the box is close, but misses the top right corner. Assisted by Edin Dzeko.
Attempt missed. Edin Dzeko (Manchester City) header from the centre of the box is just a bit too high. Assisted by James Milner with a cross following a corner.
Corner,  Manchester City. Conceded by Jamal Blackman.
Attempt saved. James Milner (Manchester City) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Gaël Clichy with a cross.

Foul by Ashley Cole (Chelsea).
Carlos Tévez (Manchester City) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

Goal!  Chelsea 3, Manchester City 2. Edin Dzeko (Manchester City) left footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by James Milner with a through ball following a fast break.
Attempt missed. Carlos Tévez (Manchester City) right footed shot from outside the box is too high.
Attempt blocked. Edin Dzeko (Manchester City) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Carlos Tévez with a through ball.
Goal!  Chelsea 3, Manchester City 1. Javi García (Manchester City) left footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom right corner following a corner.
Substitution, Chelsea. Marko Marin replaces Yossi Benayoun.
Substitution, Chelsea. Jamal Blackman replaces Petr Cech.
Substitution, Manchester City. Maicon replaces Pablo Zabaleta.
Substitution, Manchester City. James Milner replaces Albert Rusnák.
